author: Soundczar
title: More thanyou think
review: Another classic set from the beginning of Lego Town.  I got this was one of my first town sets back in the late '70's and still a favorite.  The motorcycle is constructed with multiple pieces, unlike today's single piece, making it so much easier to modify.  While the car does not have a MF in it, I just assumed he was an officer who never left the car.  He made for a perfect roadblock, because there was no one to get hurt when the criminal attempted to blast through.  If you see this one, pick it up, you will not be disappointed.
